column3: were Wikipedia:Poppy growing in the gardens of Lórien (Valinor) in Valinor. The fumellar are said to have glowed "redly in the dusk". The Irmo often used the fumellar in his enchantments.

column1: The name fumellar is Qenya: fúmella
column2: fúmellot means "poppy". The first element is related to fúmë ("sleep"; noun).
column3: p. 253 Variant Gnomish names for "poppy" are humilos
